alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 3:40PM MST until July 17 at 4:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pima County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 430 PM MST. * At 339 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Kitt Peak, or 22 miles east of Sells, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sells, San Isidro, Kitt Peak, Ali Chukson, Fresnal, San Pedro, Fresnal Canyon, Pan Tak and Ali Molina. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
